nodes.documentation:
@title ChronoBank Asset Proxy.

/// Proxy implements ERC20 interface and acts as a gateway to a single platform asset.
 Proxy adds symbol and caller(sender) when forwarding requests to platform.
 Every request that is made by caller first sent to the specific asset implementation
 contract, which then calls back to be forwarded onto platform.

/// Calls flow: Caller ->
             Proxy.func(...) ->
             Asset.__func(..., Caller.address) ->
             Proxy.__func(..., Caller.address) ->
             Platform.proxyFunc(..., symbol, Caller.address)

/// Asset implementation contract is mutable, but each user have an option to stick with
 old implementation, through explicit decision made in timely manner, if he doesn't agree
 with new rules.
 Each user have a possibility to upgrade to latest asset contract implementation, without the
 possibility to rollback.

/// Note: all the non constant functions return false instead of throwing in case if state change
 didn't happen yet.
nodes.name: ChronoBankAssetProxy
init

nodes.documentation: @dev Only platform is allowed to call.
nodes.name: onlyChronoBankPlatform

nodes.documentation: @dev Only current asset owner is allowed to call.
nodes.name: onlyAssetOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns asset implementation contract for current caller.
 @return asset implementation contract.
nodes.name: _getAsset

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns asset total supply.
 @return asset total supply.
nodes.name: totalSupply
balanceOf
allowance

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns asset decimals.
 @return asset decimals.
nodes.name: decimals
transfer
transferWithReference
_transferWithReference
__transferWithReference
transferFrom
__transferFromWithReference
approve
__approve

nodes.documentation:
@notice Emits ERC20 Transfer event on this contract.
 Can only be, and, called by assigned platform when asset transfer happens.
nodes.name: emitTransfer

nodes.documentation:
@notice Emits ERC20 Approval event on this contract.
 Can only be, and, called by assigned platform when asset allowance set happens.
nodes.name: emitApprove

nodes.documentation:
@notice Resolves asset implementation contract for the caller and forwards there transaction data,
 along with the value. This allows for proxy interface growth.
@dev Indicates an upgrade freeze-time start, and the next asset implementation contract.
nodes.name: UpgradeProposal

nodes.documentation: @dev Only asset implementation contract assigned to sender is allowed to call.
nodes.name: onlyAccess
getVersionFor

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns current asset implementation contract address.
 @return asset implementation contract address.
nodes.name: getLatestVersion

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns proposed next asset implementation contract address.
 @return asset implementation contract address.
nodes.name: getPendingVersion

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns upgrade freeze-time start.
 @return freeze-time start.
nodes.name: getPendingVersionTimestamp
proposeUpgrade
purgeUpgrade
commitUpgrade
optOut
optIn
